txt.en: Make your way to the plains surrounding the Hoardale and collect the manure from the piles lift behind by the Thistledown Aurochs there.
Deliver auorchs manure to Faranil at Glân Vraig ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You should be able to find the manure piles along the Hoarwell River where the Aurochs roam.'
Deliver auorchs manure to Faranil at Glân Vraig ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver auorchs manure to Faranil at Glân Vraig ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Faranil wants to further nurturing your sapling. She asks that you make your way into Ettenmoors along the banks of the Hoarwell, where the aurochs roam, to collect their manure.

'We must further nurture the soil in which we have your sapling. This is a task I do not envy. The wild Thistledown Aurochs make the plains south and north of the Hoardale their home. As they wander, they leave behind their manure, which is rich with nutrients that help all plants grow.'
'I will see that the soil is further enriched. Though this is a foul business it is all for the health and growth of the sapling.'
